first_para: Paul Singh Uppal (born 14 June 1967) is a Conservative Party politician from the United Kingdom. He was elected as the Member of Parliament for Wolverhampton South West in the 2010 general election, winning the seat from the incumbent Labour Party MP Rob Marris, with 16,344 votes and a majority of 691.

full.extract: Paul Singh Uppal (born 14 June 1967) is a Conservative Party politician from the United Kingdom. He was elected as the Member of Parliament for Wolverhampton South West in the 2010 general election, winning the seat from the incumbent Labour Party MP Rob Marris, with 16,344 votes and a majority of 691.
full.title: Paul Uppal
